alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 3:55AM MST until December 28 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions are expected particularly on the approach to the Zion-Mount Carmel tunnel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
